title: OneUp Announce Dropper Paddle Remote for SRAM 11 Speed
content:
Riders with the SRAM Apex, Rival, Red and Force 11 Speed groups can add OneUp Components' Dropper Paddle, mimicking the ergonomics of a paddle shifter

Read the full article at OneUp Announce Dropper Paddle Remote for SRAM 11 Speed on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
